title: A dinner set is quoted for Rs 1300. A customer pays Rs 1173 for it. If the customer got a series of two discounts and the rate of the first discount is 15%, then what was the rate for the second discount? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dude if the dinner set price is 1300 and the first discount is 15% then 15% discount amount is 195. Please check the calculation below- 1300–195=1105 where as you paid 1173. Now my point is how did you paid more if the discounted amount is 1105. In this case the discount you have received effectively is 9.77%. Hope it helps you.
